trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of rows for a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av rader for en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataRowCollection is a major component of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: DataRowCollection er en større komponent i <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> defines the schema of the table, the DataRowCollection contains the actual data for the table, where each <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the DataRowCollection represents a single row.
trans-unit.target: Mens den <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>definerer skjemaet DataRowCollection inneholder de faktiske dataene for tabellen i tabellen, der hver <xref:System.Data.DataRow>representerer én rad i DataRowCollection.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A> methods to insert and delete <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects from the DataRowCollection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe det <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Add%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A>metoder innsetting og sletting <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekter fra DataRowCollection.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A> method to search for <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects that contain specific values in primary key columns, and the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A> method to search character-based data for single words or phrases.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kalle den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>metode til å søke etter <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekter som inneholder bestemte verdier i primærnøkkelkolonnene, og <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A>metode for å søke tegnbasert-data for én ord eller uttrykk.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: For other operations, such as sorting or filtering the DataRowCollection, use methods on the DataRowCollection’s associated <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: For andre operasjoner, for eksempel sortering eller filtrering DataRowCollection, kan du bruke metoder på den DataRowCollection tilknyttede <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> til den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: To create a new <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, you must use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en ny <xref:System.Data.DataRow>må du bruke <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>metode for <xref:System.Data.DataTable>klasse.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method, a new <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object is returned using the schema of parent <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>metoden, en ny <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekt returneres med skjemaet for overordnede <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you create the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object and set the values for each of its columns, use the Add method to add the object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Når du har opprettet i <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekt og angi verdier for hver av kolonnene, Bruk Add-metode til å legge til objektet i samlingen.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: Generates an exception if the user generates an exception in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererer et unntak hvis brukeren genererer et unntak i den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>hendelsen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak, legges ikke raden i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The row is null.
trans-unit.target: Raden er null.

trans-unit.source: The row either belongs to another table or already belongs to this table.
trans-unit.target: Raden tilhører en annen tabell eller tilhører allerede denne tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The addition invalidates a constraint.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg ugyldiggjøres en begrensning.

trans-unit.source: The addition tries to put a null in a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> where <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*> is false.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg prøver å sette en null-verdi en <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> der <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*>er USANN.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a row using specified values and adds it to the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en rad som bruker angitte verdiene og legger det til den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object has its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> set to True, null should be passed to get the default value for that column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objektet har den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>satt til True, null må være angitt for å få standardverdien for kolonnen.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions can also occur if you generate an exception during either a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Unntak kan også skje hvis du genererer et unntak under enten en <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>eller <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>hendelsen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak, legges ikke raden i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The array of values that are used to create the new row.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen med verdier som brukes til å opprette ny rad.

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: Ingen.

trans-unit.source: The array is larger than the number of columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen er større enn antallet kolonner i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: A value does not match its respective column type.
trans-unit.target: En verdi samsvarer ikke med den tilsvarende kolonnetypen.

trans-unit.source: Adding the row invalidates a constraint.
trans-unit.target: Legge til raden ugyldiggjøres en begrensning.

trans-unit.source: Trying to put a null in a column where <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*> is false.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å sette en null-verdi i en kolonne der <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*>er USANN.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*>

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of all rows.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner samlingen av alle rader.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref> is enforced on the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref> gjennomført på den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the primary key of any row in the collection contains the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om primærnøkkel for en rad i samlingen inneholder den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: To use the Contains method, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object to which the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> object belongs to must have at least one column designated as a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Å bruke metoden inneholder den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet som den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>objektet tilhører må ha minst én kolonne som er angitt som en primærnøkkelkolonne.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property for more information about how to create a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>egenskapen for mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en primærnøkkelkolonne.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: As soon as you have determined that a row contains the specified value, you can use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A> method to return the specific <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object that has the value.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fastslått at en rad inneholder den angitte verdien, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>metode til å returnere angitt <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objektet som har verdien.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the primary key to test for.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den primære nøkkelen til å teste.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> with the specified primary key value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis samlingen inneholder en <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> med den angitte primærnøkkelverdien; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The table does not have a primary key.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen har en primærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the primary key columns of any row in the collection contain the values specified in the object array.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om primærnøkkelkolonnene for alle rader i samlingen inneholder verdiene som er angitt i matrisen for objektet.

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A> method with an array of values, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object to which the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> object belongs must have an array of columns designated as primary keys.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A>metode med en matrise med verdier, den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet som den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>objekt tilhører kan har en matrise med kolonner som er angitt som primærnøkler.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property for more information about how to create an array of primary key columns.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>egenskapen for mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en matrise av primærnøkkelkolonnene.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of array elements must correspond to the number of primary key columns in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Antallet matriseelementer må samsvare med antall primærnøkkelkolonner i <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: As soon as you have determined that a row contains the specified value, use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A> method to return the specific <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object that has the value.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fastslått at en rad inneholder den angitte verdien, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>metode til å returnere angitt <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objektet som har verdien.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of primary key values to test for.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med primære nøkkelverdiene til å teste.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> with the specified key values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref> inneholder en <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> med de angitte nøkkelverdiene; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The table does not have a primary key.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen har en primærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects from the collection into the given array, starting at the given destination array index.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer alle de <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekter fra samlingen i den angitte matrisen, med Start fra angitte målet matriseindeksen.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRowCollection" name="DataRowCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Endimensjonal matrise som er målet for elementene kopieres fra den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRowCollection" name="DataRowCollection" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen må ha nullbasert indeksering.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Starter den nullbaserte indeksen i matrisen på som kopiering.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects from the collection into the given array, starting at the given destination array index.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer alle de <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekter fra samlingen i den angitte matrisen, med Start fra angitte målet matriseindeksen.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRowCollection" name="DataRowCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Endimensjonal matrise som er målet for elementene kopieres fra den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRowCollection" name="DataRowCollection" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen må ha nullbasert indeksering.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Starter den nullbaserte indeksen i matrisen på som kopiering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekter i denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The total number of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekter i denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row specified by the primary key value.
trans-unit.target: Henter rad som er angitt av primærnøkkelverdien.

trans-unit.source: To use the `Find` method, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object to which the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> object belongs must have at least one column designated as a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Å bruke den `Find` metoden, den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet som den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>objekt tilhører må ha minst én kolonne som er angitt som en primærnøkkelkolonne.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property for more information about how to create a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>egenskapen for mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en primærnøkkelkolonne.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The primary key value of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: Primærnøkkelverdi av den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> til å finne.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that contains the primary key value specified; otherwise a null value if the primary key value does not exist in the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> som inneholder primærnøkkelverdi angitt; hvis en null verdi hvis verdien til primære nøkkelen ikke finnes i den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The table does not have a primary key.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen har en primærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row that contains the specified primary key values.
trans-unit.target: Henter raden som inneholder de angitte primære nøkkelverdiene.

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A> method, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object to which the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> object belongs must have at least one column designated as a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Å bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>metoden, den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet som den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>objekt tilhører må ha minst én kolonne som er angitt som en primærnøkkelkolonne.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: When two or more rows have the same primary key value, then the first row found is returned.
trans-unit.target: Når to eller flere rader, har den samme primærnøkkelverdien, returneres den første raden finnes.

trans-unit.source: This occurs when <xref:System.Data.DataSet.EnforceConstraints%2A> is set to false.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når <xref:System.Data.DataSet.EnforceConstraints%2A>er satt til false.</xref:System.Data.DataSet.EnforceConstraints%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property for more information about how to create a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> column, or an array of <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects when the table has more than one primary key.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>egenskapen for mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>kolonne eller en matrise av <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objekter når tabellen har mer enn én primærnøkkel.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of primary key values to find.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med primære nøkkelverdiene til å finne.

trans-unit.source: The type of the array is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object that contains the primary key values specified; otherwise a null value if the primary key value does not exist in the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekt som inneholder de primære nøkkelverdiene er angitt, ellers null verdi hvis verdien til primære nøkkelen ikke finnes i den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No row corresponds to that index value.
trans-unit.target: Ingen rad tilsvarer som indeksverdi.

trans-unit.source: The table does not have a primary key.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen har en primærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>for denne samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for this collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>for denne samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRow" name="DataRow" href=""></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRow" name="DataRow" href=""> </xref> til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row, or -1 if the row is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden eller -1 Hvis raden ikke finnes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new row into the collection at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn en ny rad i samlingen på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by InsertAt is reflected by the order of rows in the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> only.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen angitt av InsertAt gjenspeiles av radene i den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>bare.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: If more than one row is returned in a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> array, the inserted row may not be returned in the location specified by InsertAt.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mer enn én rad returneres i et <xref:System.Data.DataRow>matrise, satt inn raden kan ikke returneres på plasseringen angitt av InsertAt.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> property returns the row in the specified insert position.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A>egenskapen returnerer raden i posisjon angitte insert.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Select%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> may not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Select%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A>kan ikke.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you write the contents of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> as XML, for example, <xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A>, the rows are written according to the order specified by the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Når du skriver innholdet i den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>som XML, for eksempel <xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A>skrives radene i henhold til rekkefølgen som angis av <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: If the value specified for the `pos` parameter is greater than the number of rows in the collection, the new row is added to the end.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte verdien for den `pos` parameteren er større enn antall rader i samlingen, den nye raden legges til slutten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The (zero-based) location in the collection where you want to add the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRow" name="DataRow" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: (Nullbasert) plasseringen i samlingen der du vil legge til den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRow" name="DataRow" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter raden i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a specific value exists in the key column of a row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A>metode for å fastslå om det finnes en bestemt verdi i nøkkelkolonnen i en rad.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to return.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index value is greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksverdien for er større enn antallet elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: When a row is removed, all data in that row is lost.
trans-unit.target: Når en rad er fjernet, vil alle data i denne raden går tapt.

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to just mark a row for removal.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kalle den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>klassen til å merke en rad for fjerning.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling `Remove` is the same as calling <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> and then calling <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller `Remove` er lik kall <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>og kaller deretter <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Remove should not be called in a foreach loop while iterating through a <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjern skal ikke kalles i en foreach løkke under gjentakelse en <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: Remove modifies the state of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjern endrer statusen til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all members of the collection at one time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle medlemmer i samlingen om gangen.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Removes the row at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner raden i den angitte indeksen fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: When a row is removed, all data in that row is lost.
trans-unit.target: Når en rad er fjernet, vil alle data i denne raden går tapt.

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to just mark a row for removal.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kalle den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>klassen til å merke en rad for fjerning.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling `RemoveAt` is the same as calling <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> and then calling <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller `RemoveAt` er lik kall <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>og kaller deretter <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all members of the collection at one time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle medlemmer i samlingen om gangen.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to remove.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden til å fjerne.
